sentences.sentence: He was a very unusual musician inasmuch as he was totally deaf.
sentences.translation: 他是完全失聪的，从这点上来说，他是个很了不起的音乐家。

sentences.sentence: We were doubly lucky inasmuch as my friend was living on the island and spoke Greek fluently.
sentences.translation: 我们真是幸运极了，因为我的朋友住在岛上而且希腊语说得很流利。

sentences.sentence: For I speak to you Gentiles, inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles, I magnify mine office.
sentences.translation: 我对你们外邦人说这话。因我是外邦人的使徒，所以敬重我的职分。
